member_organisations: Asociacion de Fabricantes de Rodamientos Espanoles, Association Francaise de la Mecanique de Haute Precision, Fachverband Antriebstechnik Verband Deutscher Maschinen und Anlagenbau, Associazione Nationale Industria dell' Ottica Meccanica Fine e di Precisione, Rullingslagergruppen inom Severiges Verkstadsindustrier
eu_initiatives: Free Trade Agreements, Trade Defence Instruments, Anti-  Counterfeiting, Piracy and Customs
organisation_name: Federation of European Bearing Manufacturers' Associations (FEBMA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: FEBMA protects the legitimate interests of the European bearing industry. FEBMA promotes open economic engagement in three major aspects: 1. detect and respond to unfair injurious trade practices 2. protect legal rights of companies, particularly in the field of intellectual property rights 3. identify and tackle trade barriers.
